message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust in later rounds if you think it's not fair.
I'm not sure you're being fair, but I'll start with a compromise. Let's see if we can do better in the next round.
I appreciate your compromise. Let's try a 60/40 split this time.  I'm willing to negotiate further if you have other ideas.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
